app.name: Pisval Tech POS
app.fullName: Pisval Tech Point of Sale System
app.marketingTagline: Empower Your Business with Fast, Secure, and Seamless Point of Sale Solutions

about.title: About Us
about.intro: At Pisval Tech, we are dedicated to revolutionizing the retail industry through innovative point of sale solutions. Our journey began with a simple vision: to create a POS system that combines powerful functionality with intuitive design.
about.mission: Today, we serve businesses of all sizes, helping them streamline operations, enhance customer experiences, and drive growth. Our team of passionate experts is committed to continuous improvement and exceptional service

hero.changeForMore: Change for a Fast, Reliable, and Smart Point of Sale System
hero.subheading: An all-in-one POS solution designed to streamline sales, manage inventory, and grow your business with ease

home.planDescription: Choose the perfect package that suits your business needs. Our flexible pricing options are designed to scale with your growth.

packages.upgradeDescription: Upgrade your subscription or add additional packages to access more features

descriptions.starter-plus: Basic POS functionality;Inventory management;Single store support;Email support;Basic reporting;Customer database;Simple analytics
descriptions.growth-pro: Everything in Growth;Advanced inventory forecasting;Enhanced customer loyalty program;Marketing automation tools;Staff performance tracking;Customizable dashboards;Mobile app access
descriptions.custom-pro: Tailor-made solutions for your unique business needs;Perfect for businesses requiring customized POS features;Build your own feature set;Pay only for what you need;Flexible scaling options;Industry-specific solutions;Personalized onboarding
descriptions.enterprise-elite: Comprehensive POS solutions for large enterprises;Includes all advanced features and premium support;Multi-location management;Enterprise-level analytics;Custom API integrations;White-label options;Dedicated account manager;Priority 24/7 support
descriptions.premium-plus: All-inclusive POS package with premium features;Best for businesses looking for top-tier POS solutions;Advanced AI-powered analytics;Predictive inventory management;Omnichannel integration;VIP support;Quarterly business reviews;Custom reporting

extraDescriptions.starter-plus: Perfect for small businesses looking for essential features
extraDescriptions.growth-pro: Ideal for growing businesses that need advanced features
extraDescriptions.custom-pro: The ultimate flexibility with professional customization services
extraDescriptions.enterprise-elite: Complete solution for large organizations with complex requirements
extraDescriptions.premium-plus: The ultimate POS experience with cutting-edge features and premium support

errors.passwordLength: Password must be at least 8 characters
